meanings.definition: The act of going up or ascending.
meanings.sent1: The aliyos to the top of the hill was tiring but rewarding.
meanings.sent2: She watched the aliyos of the hot air balloon with awe.
meanings.sent3: The aliyos of the elevator seemed to take forever, making everyone giggle.
meanings.sent4: His spirits took an aliyos when he reached the mountain peak.
meanings.sent5: The aliyos of the airplane into the sky was a breathtaking sight.

meanings.definition: A promotion or advancement in rank or status.
meanings.sent1: His hard work led to an aliyos in his career.
meanings.sent2: The aliyos to manager brought new responsibilities.
meanings.sent3: The aliyos to head chef meant more time in the kitchen.
meanings.sent4: Her confidence took an aliyos after the promotion.
meanings.sent5: The aliyos to team leader was a proud moment for him.

meanings.definition: A reading from the Torah during a synagogue service.
meanings.sent1: He was honored to receive an aliyos during the service.
meanings.sent2: The aliyos of the Torah was beautifully chanted by the rabbi.
meanings.sent3: The aliyos of the Torah scroll was a special moment for the congregation.
meanings.sent4: The aliyos of the Torah symbolized the connection to tradition.
meanings.sent5: The aliyos of the Torah reading brought a sense of reverence to the room.
